message.content:
Apply the following corrections to GelChile product JSON files. Read each file first, then make the edits.

## PAR-001 (c:\Users\V\Documents\GitHub\Pagiweb2\src\content\products\par-001.json)
CRITICAL FIXES:
1. Change `specs["Temperatura de Trabajo"]` from "-40°C a 80°C" to "-10°C a 80°C" (ficha says -10°C)
2. Change the features item that mentions temperature from "-40°C" to "-10°C"
3. Change `specs["Norma IEC 62305"]` — rename the KEY to "Norma NF C 17-102" and keep value "Protección contra descargas atmosféricas" (the ficha specifies NF C 17-102, not IEC 62305)
4. Change features item "Norma IEC 62305" to "Norma NF C 17-102 protección contra descargas atmosféricas"

## EGR-001 (c:\Users\V\Documents\GitHub\Pagiweb2\src\content\products\egr-001.json)
CRITICAL FIX:
1. Change `specs["Power Gem Incluido"]` from "1 saco de 11,36 kg" to "4 sacos de 11,36 kg c/u"
2. Change `features` item about Power Gem from "Incluye 1 saco Power Gem de 11,36 kg" to "Incluye 4 sacos Power Gem de 11,36 kg c/u"

## PAR-002 (c:\Users\V\Documents\GitHub\Pagiweb2\src\content\products\par-002.json)
1. Change `specs.Material` from "Refractario aislante" to "Mica"
2. Add these missing specs from the ficha: "Longitud": "125 mm", "Diámetro": "6 mm", "Vida Útil": "24 meses"
3. Change `features[0]` from "Material refractario aislante" to "Material de mica con propiedades refractarias"

Make ALL these changes. Read each file, apply edits, and confirm each was saved.

content.text: I'll read all three files first, then apply the corrections.

content.text:
All three files have been verified. Here is a summary of every change made:

---

### PAR-001 (`c:\Users\V\Documents\GitHub\Pagiweb2\src\content\products\par-001.json`)

4 edits applied:

1. **`specs["Temperatura de Trabajo"]`** -- changed from `"-40°C a 80°C"` to `"-10°C a 80°C"` (line 22)
2. **`features` temperature item** -- changed from `"Temperatura de trabajo: -40°C a 80°C"` to `"Temperatura de trabajo: -10°C a 80°C"` (line 14)
3. **`specs` key renamed** -- `"Norma IEC 62305"` renamed to `"Norma NF C 17-102"`, value kept as `"Protección contra descargas atmosféricas"` (line 23)
4. **`features` norma item** -- changed from `"Norma IEC 62305 protección contra descargas atmosféricas"` to `"Norma NF C 17-102 protección contra descargas atmosféricas"` (line 11)

---

### EGR-001 (`c:\Users\V\Documents\GitHub\Pagiweb2\src\content\products\egr-001.json`)

2 edits applied:

1. **`specs["Power Gem Incluido"]`** -- changed from `"1 saco de 11,36 kg"` to `"4 sacos de 11,36 kg c/u"` (line 27)
2. **`features` Power Gem item** -- changed from `"Incluye 1 saco Power Gem de 11,36 kg"` to `"Incluye 4 sacos Power Gem de 11,36 kg c/u"` (line 15)

---

### PAR-002 (`c:\Users\V\Documents\GitHub\Pagiweb2\src\content\products\par-002.json`)

3 edits applied:

1. **`specs.Material`** -- changed from `"Refractario aislante"` to `"Mica"` (line 17)
2. **Three new specs added** after Material -- `"Longitud": "125 mm"`, `"Diámetro": "6 mm"`, `"Vida Útil": "24 meses"` (lines 18-20)
3. **`features[0]`** -- changed from `"Material refractario aislante"` to `"Material de mica con propiedades refractarias"` (line 8)

---

All files remain valid JSON and all corrections match the ficha tecnica specifications you provided.
